document_data.name: Vi'oontu
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Vi'oontu''' were a [[ninja]] clan based in the town of [[Manchar]] in [[Koryo]]. Their name meant "evening swallow that calls death".

Around [[1357 DR]], the Vi'oontu waged an ongoing war with the [[Panthers of Xi|Panthers]] of [[Xi]], who dominated the [[Vorkani Mountains]] to the north.
